extension.summary: Mod for Korean language environment of Aeon Nox 5: Redux
보다 나은 한글 지원을 위해 수정된 Aeon Nox Korean
extension.description: Aeon Nox Korean is based on Aeon Nox 5 by Big_Noid. This skin is modified for better supporting Korean fonts and displaying Korean movie rating. This modified skin works in XBMC-Korean build only. Do not install if you are not using XBMC-Korean build.
Aeon Nox Korean 스킨은 오리지널 Aeon Nox 스킨의 룩 앤 필을 유지하면서 한글을 지원하도록 수정된 스킨입니다.
